article.title: U.S. Army Procures BlackBerry Services
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Sprint Solutions Incorporated, Reston, Virginia, was awarded a $45 million firm-fixed-price contract. The award will provide for the cell phone and BlackBerry services for the U.S. Army Human Resources Command and its subordinates. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, For Knox, Kentucky, is the contracting activity.
